message: Been working on this during my free time in the past 3-4 weeks, it's now live on the app store http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/cvore/id441167126?mt=8&ls=1
It has all the basic functionality of convore (star, track, mute, search) and you can upload images directly and it has a username mention function like the Twitter iPad app
Please join the group https://convore.com/cvore/ to follow updates of the app
